subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Luge Racing
Bobsledding
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said a “neutral expert” would review the safety of the luge  and bobsled  track being built for the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee said a “neutral expert” would review the safety of the luge  and bobsled  track being built for the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia.
